title: Which one is tastier in the world of Runeterra, mangos or pineapples?
body:
So, assuming they both exist on Runeterra, which one is tastier?
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/457316449594245150/604209003907776512/sketch-1564124990048.png

replies.body:
I choose to abuse my position of perceived power and state that mangoes are tastier in Runeterra.

So there.
YES! Bio we love you so much! {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
I'm glad we've left out frivolities like "personal taste", obviously mangoes are objectively better tasting, glad League canon matches IRL canon.
{{champion:145}} : Peaches
Kaisa's new theme? https://youtu.be/wvAnQqVJ3XQ
Now, I could say something about strawberries and connect them to a champion that holds a bear but I am not

> [{quoted}](name=FSRER,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=IJ1nvGAX,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-07-26T17:51:50.280+0000)
>
> Now, I could say something about strawberries and connect them to a champion that holds a bear but I am not

She has a voice line literally talking about them bruh
I'm personally fond of Aapples {{champion:266}}
Looking forward to our newest champion: Aapple, the Darkin Fruit.
Mangos of course!
Mango FTW!!!
Both lose to oranges. Which are so out of this world in runeterra they'll bring you back from the shadow realm.
MMM I could go for some peaches tho {{champion:145}}

> [{quoted}](name=Larriet,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=IJ1nvGAX,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2019-07-27T00:25:01.733+0000)
>
> MMM I could go for some peaches tho {{champion:145}}

Thats what i said o-o

Mango because our kraken priestess says so

Also Ryze vs Syndra is interesting from lore since Syndra has almost unlimited power but can't use it all, but Ryze has world runes but doesn't necessarily want to use them so idk really. Base abilities? I think Syndra is stronger.

> [{quoted}](name=General Esdeath ,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=IJ1nvGAX,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-07-26T23:01:33.350+0000)
>
> Mango because our kraken priestess says so
> 
> Also Ryze vs Syndra is interesting from lore since Syndra has almost unlimited power but can't use it all, but Ryze has world runes but doesn't necessarily want to use them so idk really. Base abilities? I think Syndra is stronger.

Syndra has very high raw power and potential but has yet to reach her peak, and Ryze woule never use the World Runes

> [{quoted}](name=RyzeTheSmurfMage,realm=EUNE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=IJ1nvGAX,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2019-07-27T05:54:35.957+0000)
>
> Syndra has very high raw power and potential but has yet to reach her peak, and Ryze woule never use the World Runes

Exactly that though. Do we count something on a power scale when it can't/won't be used?

> [{quoted}](name=General Esdeath ,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=IJ1nvGAX,comment-id=000500000000,timestamp=2019-07-27T06:46:45.282+0000)
>
> Exactly that though. Do we count something on a power scale when it can't/won't be used?

No unless it's specified that we do. And since it isn't, it's not counted and current versions of the characters are used

Doesn't ryze literally have rocks in his possession with more raw power than all the nukes we have in real life over the whole planet combined? Sure he doesn't WANT to use it, but Syndra CAN'T use her full power

> [{quoted}](name=Skullgetti,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=IJ1nvGAX,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2019-07-26T23:04:12.657+0000)
>
> Doesn't ryze literally have rocks in his possession with more raw power than all the nukes we have in real life over the whole planet combined? Sure he doesn't WANT to use it, but Syndra CAN'T use her full power

Does he really need the World Runes to beat Syndra in her current state tho?
{{champion:202}}{{champion:202}} Who needs fruit when you can have dumplings? {{champion:202}}{{champion:202}}
